data.value: description： XexDash is a game programme reading software, opereted on xbox160 development machines and its gaming consoles’ xbrboot system. updates :Better System Interface :More language options : Game's backgrounds, ID, names and ICO display : self-defining backgrounds :Memorize the chosen drive
